mapper.sql: id, device, ts, tem, hum, ch2o, tvoc, co2, pm10, pm25
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pijia.aqo_data (device, ts, tem, hum, ch2o, tvoc, co2, pm10, pm25) VALUES (#{device}, #{ts}, #{tem}, #{hum}, #{ch2o}, #{tvoc}, #{co2}, #{pm10}, #{pm25})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM pijia.aqo_data ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1
